content: in place original credit cryptious on ravelry please don t republish elsewhere without my consent if found elsewhere this content should be free of charge using the cast-off tail on the tip of each segment start seaming together the outer sides of the project if you run out of cast-off tail while seaming you can use the leftover cast-on tail to finish the section once all the outer sides have been seamed flip the project inside out so the right side is now on the outside original credit cryptious on ravelry please don t republish elsewhere without my consent if found elsewhere this content should be free of charge tie both leaves together and then attach them to the tip of one of the segments begin stuffing the project once stuffed start seaming the centre of the project mattress stitch is best if you don t want a visible seam here but a loop stitch can work if you want a potentially easier stitch that is rather stylised once you re done weave in the tail and tie it off original credit cryptious on ravelry please don t republish elsewhere without my consent if found elsewhere this content should be free of charge note please don t eat it it won t taste like your favourite thing it will just taste of yarn trust me original credit cryptious on ravelry please don t republish elsewhere without my consent if found elsewhere this content should be free of charge
